tool_description: Spanish airport and Spanish flight data API is a tool that provides access to information about airports and flights, allowing developers to integrate real-time and historical data into their applications, such as travel booking platforms and flight tracking apps, to enhance the travel experience.
name: Spain Flight
title: Spain Flight

api_list.name: getAirports
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spain-flight1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/airport/ES"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spain-flight1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
